lines.text: No Brain, no pain... think about it.
What are you doing, man?

[Mirroring Clyde's words and actions]
I'm just fuckin' with ya'!
[zipping up Clyde's corpse in a body bag]
Takin' you up the hill, Clyde-buddy. That's the way the Indians did it.
You bury your own.
Now I thought we were going to tone down on your flabby ass.
Hey, I'm so sorry I'm not the stud you are.

[after he has shot Zowie the dog]
What are you doing?
Well, I WAS building a doggy door.
Get your ass out here Drew Gilbert, front and center!
He is gonna kick my ass!
Jeff, I love you. Stay with me, Dead Is BETTER! DEAD IS BETTER! STAY WITH ME, OH GOD!
Life's full of lessons Drew Buddy, no ones above them. Not you, Not me. Now get in!
Come on Clyde, just tell him where the cat is.
I all ready told where the cat is, now SHUT UP DICK WAD... What? You gonna sic big bad old Gus on me?

[holding Jeff's cat]
You ever seen a kitten run before?
Yeah.
No, I mean REALLY run. Like this!
[takes off]
Drew, I know your dog died, but get a grip, man, you're freaking me out!

Drew buddy, You have the right to remain silent, I'll bash your head in, You have the right to an attorney, You won't need one because you'll be dead, Do you understand these rights Drew buddy? Or are you just too fucking stupid?
